thread.title: The Family: Inside cult led by Anne Hamilton-Byrne
thread.title_full: The Family: Inside cult led by Anne Hamilton-Byrne

title: The Family: Inside cult led by Anne Hamilton-Byrne
text: Children injected with LSD, starved and locked away for DECADES: Inside Australia's notorious cult 'The Family' whose charismatic woman leader convinced followers she was Jesus Anne Hamilton-Byrne was the leader of notorious Australian sect 'The Family' She raised children in Lake Eildon in central Victoria in the 1970s and 1980s Convinced herself and 500 followers she was the reincarnation of Jesus Christ High on LSD, Hamilton-Byrne believed an apocalyptic war was imminent Believed she had a duty to collect children in preparation for a new world Children identically dressed with bleached hair shaped into the same bob Young boys and girls allegedly starved and injected with LSD by cult leaders Published: 06:18 GMT, 14 February 2017 | Updated: 06:19 GMT, 14 February 2017 100 shares
